meanings.definition: The quality or state of being systematic.
meanings.sent1: Her systematicness in organizing her desk impressed her coworkers.
meanings.sent2: The systematicness of his filing system made it easy to find documents.
meanings.sent3: His lack of systematicness in packing for the trip resulted in forgetting important items.
meanings.sent4: The systematicness of the ant colony's work ethic was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The systematicness of the assembly line ensured efficient production.

meanings.definition: The methodical and organized approach to a task or problem.
meanings.sent1: The detective's systematicness in solving the case led to the arrest of the culprit.
meanings.sent2: She approached the puzzle with systematicness, solving it piece by piece.
meanings.sent3: The systematicness of the chef's recipe creation process always resulted in delicious dishes.
meanings.sent4: His systematicness in managing his time allowed him to complete all his tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The systematicness of the team's project plan ensured timely completion.
